document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-08
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE ADDING A CHAPTER 5.21 TO THE AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE WHICH IMPLEMENTS THE PROVISIONS OF THE DIGITAL INFRASTRUCTURE AND VIDEO COMPETITION ACT OF 2006, CODIFIED IN CALIFORNIA PUBLIC UTILITIES CODE SECTION 5800 ET SEQ., WHICH THE CITY IS REQUIRED TO ADMINISTER AND ENFORCE THROUGHOUT THE CITY
